DOC.detailed_description: Sleep essential restorative function promote physical cognitive health . Previous study demonstrate child Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia ( ALL ) maintenance therapy problematic sleep pattern experience fatigue . This pilot randomize control trial examine feasibility , acceptability effectiveness intervention improve sleep quality decrease fatigue level child age 4-10 , diagnosis ALL , maintenance treatment . Families randomize usual care intervention . The intervention include sleep hygiene relaxation education session nurse practitioner , literature home , two story book , follow-up phone call . Self-reported measure use addition actigraphy measure child 's quality quantity sleep . Sleep tip evaluate intervention group family .
